modName: Beyond Skyrim Bruma Immersive Horses Patch
summary: A small patch to allow you to call horses in Cyrodiil in the already-famous Beyond Skyrim: Bruma mod.  All credits go to the Beyond Skyrim: Cyrodiil development team.
descriptionHtml:
This is a small 'some assembly required' patch to allow you to call for your favourite horse in the Tamriel world-space added by BSHeartland.esm

Just download the file and open the text document to find the code you need to put in the Immersive Horses.ini file.

This is for those who are not so great at coding, like me! :-)

I don't know if this was done already.Â  This is my first mod, so no hate, please.
author: SkyrimRules15
